overview:
## Discussion

This property controls what happens if Metal samples the acceleration structure after [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4PrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionEndTime].

Its default value is `MTLMotionBorderModeClamp`.

# motionEndBorderMode

**Instance Property**

Configures the motion border mode.

## Declaration

```swift
var motionEndBorderMode: MTLMotionBorderMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property controls what happens if Metal samples the acceleration structure after [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4PrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionEndTime].

Its default value is `MTLMotionBorderModeClamp`.
title: motionEndBorderMode
